direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve managing and updating TLD (Top-Level Domain) data, with getInstance providing access to the validator instance and updateTLDOverride allowing updates to TLD arrays.
Both methods are central to the validation process, with getInstance providing the validator instance and isValid performing the actual domain validation.
Both methods access and manage TLD-related data, with getInstance providing the validator instance and getTLDEntries retrieving TLD entries.
Both methods handle string processing, with getInstance managing the validator instance and unicodeToASCII converting domain names to ASCII format.
Both methods are involved in validating domain-related data, with getInstance providing the validator instance and isValidDomainSyntax checking the syntax of domain names.
